title: t206 Marquard, Sovereign 460, PSA 4.5--No Longer Available
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: t206 Marquard, Sovereign 460, PSA 4.5--No Longer Available
posts.post_content:
Gorgeous and tough to find Sovereign 460 for HOFer Marquard "follow through,"  in PSA 4.5.   Great image and color.  Always hard to say what PSA pop reports on this show due to not breaking down the Sov 150, 350 and tougher 460s, but Goodwin auctioned a PSA 5 not long ago and claimed "none higher."  

Price: $319.95 plus $3 postage.  This is lowest I will go.  

NO LONGER AVAILABLE, sorry.
